A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney decided to take a shit on another movie by forcing laughter through an animal sidekick... and it didn’t work unless you are under the age of 12. The last 1/3 of the movie is pretty good but it makes the first 2/3 of the movie pretty much worthless. Watching Leia use the force and “Superman” it back to the transport ship was excruciatingly painful. Lastly\, the beginning of the movie is incredibly slow (after the first 5 minutes). To the point where it teeters on boring. This movie had so much potential and in my opinion it fell flat.
